feed.title: Scrypted Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.93.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • 7c9cd9f: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • use onvif events on doorbell (Koushik Dutta)
  • default auth should be last available option (Koushik Dutta)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.94.44
entry.content:
Commits

  • fix min start (Koushik Dutta)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.96.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • f36ee6c: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • fa5b9f6: python-codecs: Fix process exit leak (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix two way audio duration (Koushik Dutta)
  • rollback portable python to 3.10 (Koushik Dutta)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.97.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • a6143e1: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix audio playback (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix updater (Koushik Dutta)
  • increase 2 way audio buffer to reduce stutter. (Koushik Dutta)
  • implement smart events (Koushik Dutta)
  • 6fd66db: amcrest/hikvision: add support for smart detections. publish. (Koushik Dutta)
  • add vehicle support (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix object detector types (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix vehicle detection class (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix events crossing streams in camera channels (Koushik Dutta)
  • update onvif two way (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix two way audio termination (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix two way audio termination (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix fetch timeout bugs (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix signal + timeout combined usage (Koushik Dutta)
  • treat self.device as future (#1401) #1401 (Brett Jia)
  • a00ae60: ha/proxmox: bump versions (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix node upgrade (Koushik Dutta)
  • update models. publish. (Koushik Dutta)
  • 4518631: tensorflow-lite: publish new models (Koushik Dutta)
  • publish new models (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix ffmpeg leaks? (Koushik Dutta)
  • avoid internal api (Koushik Dutta)
